output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" which indicates this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" and specifically promotes him as president with hashtag "#MarcelCiolacupreședinte"
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with significant reach (35,000-40,000 impressions)
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly promotes Marcel Ciolacu for president with the explicit hashtag "#MarcelCiolacupreședinte"
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an organized campaign post with CMF number and party affiliation (PSDMM)
The post violates Article 55 t) because: - It's clearly electoral propaganda for the presidential election - Uses official campaign markings (CMF number) - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Is still running after the campaign period ended - Has significant reach through paid promotion

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu for president - Is a paid advertisement reaching tens of thousands - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags - Is organized party communication (PSDMM)
conclusion.message-for-police: PSDMM, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei electorale, prin intermediul unei postări sponsorizate pe Facebook (ID: 1650154845845951) care promovează explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU la funcția de președinte, folosind hashtag-ul "#MarcelCiolacupreședinte" și materiale de campanie oficiale (CMF 11240017). Postarea, care a avut un impact semnificativ (35,000-40,000 impresii) și continuă să fie activă după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, reprezintă o încălcare clară a legislației electorale, având un evident obiectiv electoral de influențare a votului în favoarea candidatului PSD la președinție.
